title: The Two Doors

Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: Perceiving multiple timelines, existing in probability
knowledge: Door 1: Remain human, stable but mortal, thin places eventually recede
Door 2: Transform completely into pure pattern in higher dimensions
Humanity must choose but can't perceive options
Third option: Both doors stay open, humanity splits
Reeves's attack failed, Changed saved him
transformation_markers: Time is optional for his consciousness
Still retains enough humanity to save Reeves

Sera_Volkov.role: Exists across probability branches, guides network vote
Sera_Volkov.consciousness: No longer individual, threaded through time

Colonel_Reeves.action: Led strike on Voyager, nearly died, saved by Changed
Colonel_Reeves.realization: Changed aren't enemies, just different consciousness

themes_touched: Choice requiring understanding that choice provides
atmosphere: Temporal vertigo, ultimate choice approaching, beautiful terrible clarity
key_images: Network acting as one to save enemy
Voyager as messenger with two paths
foreshadowing: Changed splitting into transcendent and bridge
Humanity splitting into unchanged and transformed
